me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport
Interface SMTPClientTransportFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyLMTPClientTransportFactory, NettySMTPClientTransportFactory
public interface SMTPClientTransportFactory

Factory which is responsible for creating SMTPClientTransport implementations

Author:
Norman Maurer

Method Summary
 SMTPClientTransport createPlain()
          Create a SMTPClientTransport instance which use plain SMTP
 SMTPClientTransport createSMTPS(SSLContext context)
          Return a SMTPClientTransport which use SMTPS (encrypted)
 SMTPClientTransport createStartTLS(SSLContext context, boolean failOnNoSupport)
          Create SMTPClientTransport which uses plain SMTP but switch to encryption later via the STARTTLS extension
 

Method Detail

Create a SMTPClientTransport instance which use plain SMTP

Returns:
plainClient

SMTPClientTransport createSMTPS(SSLContext context)
Return a SMTPClientTransport which use SMTPS (encrypted)

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
smtpsClient

createStartTLS

SMTPClientTransport createStartTLS(SSLContext context,
                                   boolean failOnNoSupport)
Create SMTPClientTransport which uses plain SMTP but switch to encryption later via the STARTTLS extension

Parameters:
context -
failOnNoSupport - if true the client will throw an SMTPUnsupportedExtensionException if STARTTLS is not supported. If false it will just continue in plain mode (no encryption)
Returns:
starttlsClient
